mapper.sql: id, reason, createUser, createTime, sourceId, sourceType, updateAdmin, updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, IF(t1.title IS NULL, t2.answer, CONCAT(t1.title,t1.detail)) content, IF(t1.status IS NULL, t2.status, t1.status) STATUS, t3.nickname as createUsername FROM bb_question_tip_off t LEFT JOIN bb_question t1 ON (t.sourceId=t1.id AND t.sourceType = 'question') LEFT JOIN bb_question_answer t2 ON (t.sourceId=t2.id AND (t.sourceType = 'answer' OR t.sourceType='comment')) LEFT JOIN abc12366_uc.uc_user t3 ON t.createUser = t3.id
SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_tip_off WHERE sourceId = #{sourceId} and createUser = #{createUser}
SELECT count(id) FROM bb_question_tip_off WHERE sourceId = #{sourceId}
